name: trkgitv
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

-| wceq(citv, cslot(cfv(citv, cnx)))
-| wss(csn(cop(cfv(citv, cnx), c0)), c2)

⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 =(Itv ` c2))
⊣ c2[Struct]< 1, cdc(1, 6)>
⊣ Itv = Slot((Itv ` ndx))
⊣ { <(Itv ` ndx), c0 > } ⊆ c2
